author: CMSTrackerDPG
body:
#### PR description:
Fix to tracker map creation script. Adds a unit test for offline Tkmap creation.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:
Backport of #34966. Resolves #34607.
title: [11_3_X] TkDQM:Fix tracker maps for run3
